duration_in_months: The contract will last for 12 months
full_summary:
### Tender Notice for MRB ECs Installation of Cranes

*   **Title:** MRB - ECs Installation of Cranes
*   **Reference:** cb-231-44373233
*   **Amendment:** 5
*   **Invitation Number:** W8472-245921/B
*   **Publication Date:** April 11, 2024
*   **Closing Date:** May 24, 2024
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** May 20, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** May 20, 2025

### Notice Details

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the National Defence Headquarters (NDHQ) procurement. The purpose of this notice is to solicit goods for the MRB capital project for the installation of cranes by electrical contractors (ECs).

The procurement is for the following items:

*   **Item 001:** Thermostatistics (Flow Control) - Part Number: TP970B2010
*   **Item 002:** Automatic Change-over Switch - Part Number: A435A2D
*   **Item 003:** Fan Coil Unit - Part Number: BRW-170-DD-3K-ND

The proposed contract is for the provision of goods only. The shipping location for all items is Halifax.

### Procurement Method

The procurement will be conducted using the Competitive Traditional method.

### Evaluation Criteria

The proposals will be evaluated based on the "Lowest Price" criterion.

### Access to Contracts

Prospective tenderers may access the solicitation documents and relevant information through the Government Electronic Procurement System (GEPS) at https://buyandsell.gc.ca.

Files Uploaded to the GEPS include:
*   Attachment: W8472-245921_B_RFP-MRB-ECs-Cranes-Amend003-Bilingual.pdf
*   Attachment: W8472-245921_B_RFP-MRB-ECs-Cranes-Amend002-Bilingual.pdf
*   Attachment: W8472-245921_B_RFP-MRB-ECs-Cranes-Amend001-Bilingual_0.pdf
*   Attachment: W8472-245921_B_RFP-MRB-ECs-Install-Cranes-Eng.pdf

### Contact

For further information, or to request a solicitation document, please contact:
Nadine Baril  
Nadine.Baril@forces.gc.ca  
613-862-7297
